game.name: Vampire Hunter: Nightrise
game.categories: Single-player, Full controller support, Playable without Timed Input, Stereo Sound, Surround Sound, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Hunt the vampire before he awakens in this tense FPS dungeon crawl. Explore a shifting castle of traps and secrets, master its hidden mechanics, and survive long enough to stake the monster before Nightrise.
